products.name: MI60 Microinverter
products.net_guideline:
The Schuko cable should not be connected to your home grid yet!

Step 1: Please make sure the DC power supply (cable solar panel to inverter) is connected.

Step 2: Wait 90 seconds when the indicator light of the inverter blink red.

Step 3: Connect your phone to the Wi-Fi of the Microinverter MI-XXXXXXXX and return to the Anker App.

Password:12345678
products.conn_confirm_tips: Press the button on the device to connect.

products.name: Smart Meter
products.net_guideline:
After the smart meter is turned on, if the device communicates normally, the signal indicator light will flash blue and it is in the Bluetooth broadcast state.
If the blue indicator light does not flash, please press and hold the button for 7 seconds and wait until the blue indicator light flashes to perform Bluetooth network configuration.
products.conn_confirm_tips: Press the device's IoT button to connect.

products.name: Smart Plug
products.net_guideline:
When the indicator light flashes green, the device is in network configuration mode.
If the indicator light stays green, please long press the button to put the device into network configuration mode.
products.conn_confirm_tips: Press the device's IoT button to connect.

products.name: 250W Prime Charger
products.net_guideline: Select the Wi-Fi option on the device setting, and a Wi-Fi flashing icon will appear on the device screen.
products.conn_confirm_tips: Press the button on the device to connect.

products.name: 240W Charging Station
products.net_guideline: Press and hold the Display Button for 5 seconds until a Wi-Fi flashing icon appears on the device screen.
products.conn_confirm_tips: Press the button on the device to connect.
